raw: THE BAHRIA UNIVERSITY ORDINANCE 2000 CONTENTS 1. Short title and commencement 2. Definitions 3. Establishment and incorporation of the University 4. Purposes, powers and functions of the University 5. University open to all classes, creeds etc 6. Officers of the University 7. Chancellor 8. Pro-Chancellor 9. Rector 10. Registrar 11. Director of Examinations and academic affairs 12. Director Finance 13. Director (Research and Development) 14. Heads of Constituent Units 15. Authorities 16. Board of Governors 17. Meetings of the Board etc 18. Executive Committee 19. Academic Council 20. Faculty Board of Studies 21. Selection Board 22. Governing Bodies for Constituent Units 23. Finance and Planning Committee 24. Academic and non-academic employees 25. Statutes 26. Regulations 27. Rules 28. University funds, audit and accounts 29. Indemnity and bar of jurisdiction 30. Retirement and reemployment 31. Pension, insurance, gratuity, provident fund and benevolent fund 32. Opportunity to show cause 33. Appeal to, and review by, the Board 34. Commencement of term of office of members of authorities 35. Filling of casual vacancies in authorities 36. Filling of vacancies in authorities in certain circumstances 37. Disputes about membership of authorities etc 38. Proceedings of authorities not invalidated by vacancies 39. Interpretation 40. Removal of difficulties THE BAHRIA UNIVERSITY ORDINANCE 2000 ORDINANCE NO. V OF 2000 [7th February, 2000] An Ordinance to provide for the establishment of Bahria University at Islamabad WHEREAS it is expedient to provide for the establishment of Bahria University at Islamabad and to provide for the matters connected therewith or incidental thereto; AND WHEREAS the National Assembly and the Senate stand suspended in pursuance of the Proclamation of Emergency of the fourteenth day of October, 1999, and the Provisional Constitution Order No. 1 as amended; AND WHEREAS the President is satisfied that circumstances exist which render it necessary to t
